description: Unauthorized access breach requires 12-month credit monitoring
Lost device breach requires 24-month credit monitoring plus
Phishing attack breach requires identity theft prevention services
Ransomware infection breach requires credit freeze services
Email transmission breach requires fraud alert services
Data disposal breach requires legal services for victims
SQL injection breach requires annual credit report review
Misdirected fax breach requires minimal mitigation services
Insider threat breach requires document restoration assistance
Cloud misconfiguration breach requires comprehensive mitigation
Unattended workstation requires credit monitoring services
Third-party breach requires identity theft prevention services
